thread.title: Garbine Muguruza beats Safarova in WTA Finals debut - Daily Journal
thread.title_full: Garbine Muguruza beats Safarova in WTA Finals debut - Daily Journal - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Daily Journal
title: Garbine Muguruza beats Safarova in WTA Finals debut - Daily Journal
text:
Second seed Garbine Muguruza had a successful debut at the WTA Finals, recording a 6-3, 7-6 win against Lucie Safarova on Monday. Muguruza, who is the first Spaniard to play in the WTA Finals since Arantxa Sanchez-Vicario in 2001, didn't face a break point in the first set and captured it by breaking Safarova's serve in the final game.
 Daily Journal.
